Replace.Text: 城市中的海军活动区域，防御工事的攻击范围为1。同时取消从该单元格上下船的 [ICON_Movement] 移动力消耗。必须修建在和陆地相邻的海岸或湖泊单元格上。无法建造在礁石上。[NEWLINE]为相邻单元格提供-1魅力。

A district for naval activity in your city, attack range of defence is 1. Also removes the [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty for embarking and disembarking to and from this tile. Must be built on Coast or Lake Terrain adjacent to land. Cannot be built on Reef.[NEWLINE]-1 Appeal.
您城市里的工业活动区。[NEWLINE]为相邻单元格提供-1魅力。
A district in your city for industrial activity.[NEWLINE]-1 Appeal.

您城市里的军事机构区，防御工事的攻击范围为1。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]与农场相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]与牧场相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]与种植园相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]与营地相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]与运河相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]与航空港相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]与市政广场相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]与军营相邻时+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房。（需“城市圈”游戏模式）[NEWLINE]与国家军营相邻时+3 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]为相邻单元格提供-1魅力。

A district in your city for military facilities, attack range of defence is 1.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Farm.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Pasture.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Plantation.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Camp.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Canal.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Aerodrome.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Government plaza.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to Encampment. (Requries Megalopolis game mode)[NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Housing] Housing when adjacent to National Encampment.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-1 Appeal.
